inclusion.criterion: symptomatic native aortic valve stenosis and age ≥18 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: aortic valve area (AVA) ≤ 1 cm2 or indexed AVA ≤ 0.6 cm2/m2, mean aortic gradient < 40 mmHg and stroke volume index (SVI) < 35ml/m2
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: MDCT aortic valve calcium score men > 2000AU, women > 1200AU OR the likelihood criteria are fulfilled (symptoms without other explanation and LV hypertrophy; age < 70 yrs., AVS < 0.8 cm2; SVI < 35ml/m2 confirmed by 3D TOE, MRI or invasive; reduced LV longitudinal function without other reason)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: heart team agrees on eligibility for TAVR
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: negative pregnancy test in women with childbearing potential
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: pre-existing mechanical or bio-prosthetic valve in any position
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: need for heart surgery due to other conditions
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: aortic valve is congenital unicuspid or congenital bicuspid
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy with or without obstruction
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: echocardiographic evidence of intracardiac mass, thrombus or vegetation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: acute myocardial infarction within 1 month before intended AS-treatment
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: estimated life expectancy < 24 months (730 days) due to carcinomas end stage liver disease or renal disease
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptomatic native aortic valve stenosis, age is not specified but appears to be over 18. He has a history of hypertension and hyperlipidemia, and is being evaluated for valvular replacement.
